test.title: Meta-Cognition Intelligence Framework (MCIF-5)
test.description: An introspective exploration of thought structure, synthesis depth, and consciousness mapping. This assessment measures not only what you think — but *how* your cognition organizes, reflects, and expands.

phases.title: Lucid Entry
phases.content: Welcome to the MCIF-5 Cognitive Matrix. This is a reflective journey, not a test. Breathe deeply. You may choose a sound frequency for optimal mental resonance before beginning.

phases.title: Frequency Calibration
phases.content: Select your preferred cognitive frequency tone for focus and coherence.

phases.title: Cognitive Orientation
phases.content: Before we begin, remember: This framework observes your *process* of awareness — not correctness. It measures reflection, synthesis, adaptability, and visionary thinking. You may answer intuitively.

questions.question: How quickly do your thoughts move compared to others?
Describe what it feels like when you are ‘in flow’ — when your thoughts synchronize perfectly.
When your mind moves too fast, what tends to happen?
When presented with new data, what do you notice first?
Rate your ability to see connections between unrelated subjects.
Describe a time when you synthesized many ideas into one powerful concept.
When emotion and logic conflict, which tends to guide your final decision?
options: Emotion — it gives me the bigger picture.
Depends on the environment or stakes.

questions.question: How emotionally attuned are you to others' thoughts while processing your own?
What role does emotion play in your creativity or reasoning?
How often do you observe your own thoughts from a third-person perspective?
What does ‘awareness of awareness’ mean to you personally?
Do you experience thoughts as words, images, energy, or something else?
After intense reflection, what is your natural recovery process?
How easily can you translate inner insights into external action?

phases.title: Your Cognitive Profile

feedback_rules.feedback: You exhibit high thought velocity — a hallmark of advanced synthesis capacity. Grounding practices will help harness this power into coherent output.
You are a systems-level thinker, capable of mapping complex interrelations beyond surface logic.

feedback_rules.condition: p3_q2 > 7 && p3_q1 == 'A balanced synthesis of both.'
feedback_rules.feedback: You operate through emotive logic — both analytical and intuitive, merging feeling and reasoning in balance.
You demonstrate meta-awareness — the ability to observe cognition itself. This is a sign of reflective consciousness maturity.
You possess strong integration — your insights naturally become creative or actionable energy.

phases.summary: Your profile blends velocity, synthesis, reflection, and emotional intelligence — an architecture of awareness that defines the Lucid Mind archetype.
